title.rendered: Chateau Rustic Pine Dining Table – Rectangle

content.rendered:
The Chateau Rustic Dining Table is our Chateau Dining Base with our unique rustic table top!

Made with a cast iron base and a 34mm chunky solid wooden table top. Each table top is unique!

The Chateau comes with height adjustable feet. This table comes with a 5 year guarantee. This item requires basic self assembly. This table comes with 2x 4 Leg Bases.

We also offer this item in Round or Square as well as poseur height. This item can also be made to order in virtually any size and with any table base – please call or email for more information.

This top is rustic, it may not be perfectly smooth, flat or level as each item is unique.
